Class OATable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.jsp.OATable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OAJspComponent, java.io.Serializable

    public class OATable
extends java.lang.Object
implements OAJspComponent
    Ajax table component, supports binding, editors, custom event handling.

    vvia
